snippet: ROSSI--Dr. Giuseppe. It is with sadness that the family of doctor Giuseppe Rossi announces his passing on March 7, 2016, in Naples, Florida. He will be sorely missed by Gemma, his beloved wife of 55 years, his son Roberto, his daughter-in-law Caroline, his granddaughter, Colette, as well as his brother, Plinio, in-laws Maddalena, Marinella, Mario, Angela and many nieces and nephews in Italy, and not least a large community of friends on both sides of the Atlantic. In lieu of flowers, contributions can be made in his name to the Memorial Sloan Kettering Cancer Center, in support of the Lymphoma Research of Doctor Zelenetz. For more information, please call (212) 639-5053. 1/3
